sentences.english: I don't think we need a chaperon.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们不需要监护人。

sentences.english: In Scotts law pupil children have tutors.
sentences.chinese: 在苏格兰法律中，学令儿童有监护人。

sentences.english: Note: Parent or guardian may sign on behalf of a minor aged less than 18 years.
sentences.chinese: 周岁的未成年人可由父母或监护人代签。

sentences.english: I'm the supervisor in charge of the thain during this period.
sentences.chinese: 我是随车监护人员，负责此期间对火车的监护工作。

sentences.english: Pers on who act on behalf of a minor is a defendant in a court case.
sentences.chinese: 在一案子中代表未成年人被告的监护人。

sentences.english: She is a satisfaction to the parents and guardians of the prentices.
sentences.chinese: 那个学徒的父母和监护人对她很满意。

sentences.english: The guardian must be entrusted by the student's parents. The Letter of Entrustment must be legally notarized.
sentences.chinese: 监护人受学生家长委托，委托书须经法律公正方为。

sentences.english: Once there is a suddenness, system would raise an auto-alarm to the monitors.
sentences.chinese: 有异常发生时，系统会自动向监护人员发出警报。

sentences.english: The young girl would go nowhere without her chaperon.
sentences.chinese: 这个年轻女孩去任何地方都有监护人跟着。

sentences.english: Informed consents were obtained from guardians of all the participants.
sentences.chinese: 以上参与者监护人均知情同意。

sentences.english: The attendant must have the confined space entry training.
sentences.chinese: 监护人员必须接受受限空间准入程序的培训。

sentences.english: After the girl's parents died, she was made a ward of her uncle and aunt.
sentences.chinese: 这女孩的父母双亡后，舅父和舅母成了她的监护人。

sentences.english: Occupational exposures are important contributors to asthma in health care providers.
sentences.chinese: 职业暴露是健康监护人员患哮喘病的重要因素。

sentences.english: He was charged with absconding from lawful custody.
sentences.chinese: 他被指控从合理监护人那里逃走。

sentences.english: Testamentary guardians function only when both parents are not around.
sentences.chinese: 监护人的义务只在父母亲皆不在世的情况下有效。

sentences.english: Competitor aged under 21, this application form must be countersigned by guardian.
sentences.chinese: 岁之赛员，必须由监护人于表格上签署。
